changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.transformation_metarule ( id bigserial NOT NULL, service bigint NOT NULL, sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL, resource_map bigint NOT NULL, product_map bigint NOT NULL, product_network_resource bigint, stop_on_match boolean DEFAULT false, research bigint, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, CONSTRAINT transformation_metarule_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT transformation_metarule_product_map_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product_map) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT transformation_metarule_product_network_resource_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product_network_resource) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT transformation_metarule_service_fkey FOREIGN KEY (service) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT transformation_metarule_resource_map_fkey FOREIGN KEY (resource_map) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT transformation_metarule_service_key UNIQUE (service , sequence_number ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
